catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 492
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: orange cover; images of people at beginning--man riding a fish; man and woman working; basket weavers; archers; also images of animals including fish, birds; flowers; itinerate people; insects; landscapes; fruits; ephemera
markings: square seal URC of front page; round seal LLC of back page; sticker LLC back cover
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
title: Pictorial Designs for All Artisans (Banshoku zukō 万職図考), vol. 5
